reviewText: It was a really good movie up until the last 10 minutes of the movie when there was language. We we're so surprised to hear this in a Christian movie.

This documovie, was everything & more. The story was true to the bible, the acting was amazing, costumes were true to the era. After watching this on Amazon instant, I decided to buy the DVD. Excellent!

Great movie, well made and well acted.  If you like biblical stories on film you will love this one. Great directing and whoever picked the locations for filming did an awesome job. You feel like you are there with them in the Holy Land watching the story unfold. I know I will watch this film many times over and share it with my family and friends also.
Great adaptation of Saul of Tarsus
A must watch for the believer. I wish it was longer. Hopefully a mini series will follow.

Good

Very enjoyable.  Details were somewhat shallow, but it is a movie afterall and only made to fit in a particular time slot.  Everyday life continued so the additions of life stories, although not biblical is a given.  The moral of the story was allowed to come through:  God's love for the world was revealed through His son Jesus Christ.  His words of love and forgiveness is mankind's only hope. Once understood, one can never be the same - I am a witness to that.  Praise God!
Good Movie, liked it very much.
This is an excellent movie!  I learned so much from it!  I highly suggest it!
All good
Some dramatic license, but it may be OK given that it emphasizes element of Paul's conversion that otherwise might be ignored. Overall, worthwhile viewing.

I am very impressed with this movie. It is a high quality film, with good acting. The storyline is mostly true to the Bible with only minor additional content, such as the wedding that was interrupted by Saul. Even so, this was acceptable as the Scripture does say that Saul went from place to place rounding up believer. As a biblicist, I am very particular about taking away or adding to Bible stories. All in all, this is a wonderful resource for Christians. I pray that the producers would consider creating more films like this.
Excellent and true
I enjoyed this movie, it was exciting.

buena pelicula
I wasn't impressed With this version Of The Apostle Paul ! I have seen Much Better Movies .It doesn't Follow Scripture as Much as Others DVD's I have seen !
Great New DVD for My Movies on Saint Paul..

I wish that this movie had went into more detail about Paul's life after he became a Christian. They did take a lot of liberties. The one thing it did for me is show just how awful Saul was before he became a Christian. Reading the Bible about Saul you form in your mind how bad Saul was but seeing it showed how Jesus can take such a sinner and use him in such a way. We were all sinners before we came to Christ and Paul said he was "the chief sinner." Before I repented of my sins and accepted Jesus Christ as my savior I too felt like I was the chief of sinners. Overall a good movie but beware there are two curse words which should had been left out.
Great movie!!!
